verses.verse: And it came to pass in the <S%H259%H6240>eleventh<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%>, in the <S%H7992>third<s%> month, in the <S%H259>first<s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%>, that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>speak<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and to his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>; Whom art thou <S%H1819>like<s%> in thy <S%H1433>greatness<s%>?

¶ Behold, the <S%H804>Assyrian<s%> was a <S%H730>cedar<s%> in <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> with <S%H3303>fair<s%> <S%H6057>branches<s%>, and with a <S%H6751>shadowing<s%> <S%H2793>shroud<s%>, and of an <S%H1362>high<s%> <S%H6967>stature<s%>; and his <S%H6788>top<s%> was among the thick <S%H5688>boughs<s%>.

The <S%H4325>waters<s%> made him <S%H1431>great<s%>, the <S%H8415>deep<s%> set him up on <S%H7311>high<s%> with her <S%H5104>rivers<s%> <S%H1980>running<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%> his <S%H4302>plants<s%>, and sent <S%H7971>out<s%> her little <S%H8585>rivers<s%> unto all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>.

Therefore his <S%H6967>height<s%> was <S%H1361>exalted<s%> above all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%>, and his <S%H5634>boughs<s%> were <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, and his <S%H6288>branches<s%> became <S%H748>long<s%> because of the <S%H7227>multitude<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%>, when he shot <S%H7971>forth<s%>.

All the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> made their <S%H7077>nests<s%> in his <S%H5589>boughs<s%>, and under his <S%H6288>branches<s%> did all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> bring forth their <S%H3205>young<s%>, and under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> all <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
Thus was he <S%H3302>fair<s%> in his <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, in the <S%H753>length<s%> of his <S%H1808>branches<s%>: for his <S%H8328>root<s%> was by <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%>.

The <S%H730>cedars<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> could not <S%H6004>hide<s%> him: the fir <S%H1265>trees<s%> were not <S%H1819>like<s%> his <S%H5589>boughs<s%>, and the chesnut <S%H6196>trees<s%> were not like his <S%H6288>branches<s%>; nor any <S%H6086>tree<s%> in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> was <S%H1819>like<s%> unto him in his <S%H3308>beauty<s%>.

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H3303>fair<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of his <S%H1808>branches<s%>: so that all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>, that were in the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H7065>envied<s%> him.

¶ Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because thou hast lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> thyself in <S%H6967>height<s%>, and he hath shot <S%H5414>up<s%> his <S%H6788>top<s%> among the thick <S%H5688>boughs<s%>, and his <S%H3824>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H7311>up<s%> in his <S%H1363>height<s%>;

I have therefore <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the mighty <S%H410>one<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>; he shall <S%H6213>surely<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> with him: I have driven him <S%H1644>out<s%> for his <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>.

And <S%H2114>strangers<s%>, the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>, have cut him <S%H3772>off<s%>, and have <S%H5203>left<s%> him: upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and in all the <S%H1516>valleys<s%> his <S%H1808>branches<s%> are <S%H5307>fallen<s%>, and his <S%H6288>boughs<s%> are <S%H7665>broken<s%> by all the <S%H650>rivers<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are gone <S%H3381>down<s%> from his <S%H6738>shadow<s%>, and have <S%H5203>left<s%> him.

Upon his <S%H4658>ruin<s%> shall all the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> <S%H7931>remain<s%>, and all the <S%H2416>beasts<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> shall be upon his <S%H6288>branches<s%>:

To the end that none of all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> by the <S%H4325>waters<s%> <S%H1361>exalt<s%> themselves for their <S%H6967>height<s%>, neither shoot <S%H5414>up<s%> their <S%H6788>top<s%> among the thick <S%H5688>boughs<s%>, neither their <S%H352>trees<s%> stand <S%H5975>up<s%> in their <S%H1363>height<s%>, all that <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>: for they are all <S%H5414>delivered<s%> unto <S%H4194>death<s%>, to the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when he went <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7585>grave<s%> I caused a <S%H56>mourning<s%>: I <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H8415>deep<s%> for him, and I <S%H4513>restrained<s%> the <S%H5104>floods<s%> thereof, and the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> were <S%H3607>stayed<s%>: and I caused <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> to <S%H6937>mourn<s%> for him, and all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> <S%H5969>fainted<s%> for him.

I made the <S%H1471>nations<s%> to <S%H7493>shake<s%> at the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H4658>fall<s%>, when I cast him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>hell<s%> with them that <S%H3381>descend<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>: and all the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>, the <S%H4005>choice<s%> and <S%H2896>best<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, all that <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, shall be <S%H5162>comforted<s%> in the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

They also went <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H7585>hell<s%> with him unto them that be <S%H2491>slain<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and they that were his <S%H2220>arm<s%>, that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> under his <S%H6738>shadow<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>.

¶ To whom art thou thus <S%H1819>like<s%> in <S%H3519>glory<s%> and in <S%H1433>greatness<s%> among the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%>? yet shalt thou be brought <S%H3381>down<s%> with the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of <S%H5731>Eden<s%> unto the nether <S%H8482>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> with them that be <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%>. This is <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> and all his <S%H1995>multitude<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
